alert.note: Alert for Dawes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dawes County through 330 PM MDT... At 256 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Chadron Airport, or 9 miles northwest of Chadron, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chadron Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
